item.title: Scan Your Code with Ephemeral SonarQube in GitHub Actions
item.description:
As developers, we all know the importance of maintaining high code quality standards. One powerful tool that can help us achieve this is SonarQube, a renowned platform for continuous code quality inspection. However, setting up and maintaining a dedicated SonarQube instance can be a cumbersome task, requiring significant resources and ongoing maintenance. Fortunately, GitHub Actions offers a convenient solution by allowing us to spin up an ephemeral (short-lived) SonarQube instance directly within our workflow.
